Global

Methods

endianness(bytes, offset)

Source:
  • index.js, line 15
Swap the endianness of units of information in a byte array. The original array is modified in-place.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
bytes !Array.<number> | !Array.<string> | Uint8Array The bytes.
offset number The number of bytes of each unit of information.

swap(bytes, offset, index)

Source:
  • index.js, line 31
Swap the endianness of a unit of information in a byte array. The original array is modified in-place.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
bytes !Array.<number> | !Array.<string> | Uint8Array The bytes.
offset number The number of bytes of the unit of information.
index number The start index of the unit of information.
